<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (head-active_data.js) */
var dw = (window.dw || {});
dw.ac = {
    _analytics: null,
    _events: [],
    _category: "",
    _searchData: "",
    _anact: "",
    _anact_nohit_tag: "",
    _analytics_enabled: "true",
    _timeZone: "US/Central",
    _capture: function(configs) {
        if (Object.prototype.toString.call(configs) === "[object Array]") {
            configs.forEach(captureObject);
            return;
        }
        dw.ac._events.push(configs);
    },
	capture: function() { 
		dw.ac._capture(arguments);
		// send to CQ as well:
		if (window.CQuotient) {
			window.CQuotient.trackEventsFromAC(arguments);
		}
	},
    EV_PRD_SEARCHHIT: "searchhit",
    EV_PRD_DETAIL: "detail",
    EV_PRD_RECOMMENDATION: "recommendation",
    EV_PRD_SETPRODUCT: "setproduct",
    applyContext: function(context) {
        if (typeof context === "object" && context.hasOwnProperty("category")) {
        	dw.ac._category = context.category;
        }
        if (typeof context === "object" && context.hasOwnProperty("searchData")) {
        	dw.ac._searchData = context.searchData;
        }
    },
    setDWAnalytics: function(analytics) {
        dw.ac._analytics = analytics;
    },
    eventsIsEmpty: function() {
        return 0 == dw.ac._events.length;
    }
};
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (head-cquotient.js) */
var CQuotient = window.CQuotient = {};
CQuotient.clientId = 'bhgx-balmain-us';
CQuotient.realm = 'BHGX';
CQuotient.siteId = 'balmain-us';
CQuotient.instanceType = 'prd';
CQuotient.locale = 'en_US';
CQuotient.fbPixelId = '__UNKNOWN__';
CQuotient.activities = [];
CQuotient.cqcid='';
CQuotient.cquid='';
CQuotient.cqeid='';
CQuotient.cqlid='';
CQuotient.apiHost='api.cquotient.com';
/* Turn this on to test against Staging Einstein */
/* CQuotient.useTest= true; */
CQuotient.useTest = ('true' === 'false');
CQuotient.initFromCookies = function () {
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
	  var c = ca[i];
	  while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
	  if (c.indexOf('cqcid=') == 0) {
		CQuotient.cqcid=c.substring('cqcid='.length,c.length);
	  } else if (c.indexOf('cquid=') == 0) {
		  var value = c.substring('cquid='.length,c.length);
		  if (value) {
		  	var split_value = value.split("|", 3);
		  	if (split_value.length > 0) {
			  CQuotient.cquid=split_value[0];
		  	}
		  	if (split_value.length > 1) {
			  CQuotient.cqeid=split_value[1];
		  	}
		  	if (split_value.length > 2) {
			  CQuotient.cqlid=split_value[2];
		  	}
		  }
	  }
	}
}
CQuotient.getCQCookieId = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqcid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqcid;
};
CQuotient.getCQUserId = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cquid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cquid;
};
CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqeid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqeid;
};
CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqlid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqlid;
};
CQuotient.trackEventsFromAC = function (/* Object or Array */ events) {
try {
	if (Object.prototype.toString.call(events) === "[object Array]") {
		events.forEach(_trackASingleCQEvent);
	} else {
		CQuotient._trackASingleCQEvent(events);
	}
} catch(err) {}
};
CQuotient._trackASingleCQEvent = function ( /* Object */ event) {
	if (event && event.id) {
		if (event.type === dw.ac.EV_PRD_DETAIL) {
			CQuotient.trackViewProduct( {id:'', alt_id: event.id, type: 'raw_sku'} );
		} // not handling the other dw.ac.* events currently
	}
};
CQuotient.trackViewProduct = function(/* Object */ cqParamData){
	var cq_params = {};
	cq_params.cookieId = CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.product = cqParamData.product;
	cq_params.realm = cqParamData.realm;
	cq_params.siteId = cqParamData.siteId;
	cq_params.instanceType = cqParamData.instanceType;
	cq_params.locale = CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(CQuotient.sendActivity) {
		CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewProduct', cq_params);
	} else {
		CQuotient.activities.push({activityType: 'viewProduct', parameters: cq_params});
	}
};
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

    window.isNightModeEnforced = false

    var body = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];

    if (window.isNightModeEnforced) {
       body.classList.add('night');
    } else if (localStorage.getItem('switch-mode') !== null) {
        body.classList.add(localStorage.getItem('switch-mode'));
    } else {
        body.classList.add('day');
    }

    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', (event) => {
        var themeColor = document.querySelector('meta[name="theme-color"]');
        if (themeColor) {
            body.classList.remove('day', 'night');
            body.classList.add('notransition', themeColor.content);
            body.classList.remove('notransition');
        }
    });
</script>

            </li>
        

        
    
</ul>

                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>

<script>
  /* Configuration variables */
  window.ssp_key  = 'balmain';
  window.ssp_env  = 'prd';
  window.ssp_lang = 'en';
  window.ssp_tld  = 'sspinc.io';
  window.ssp_version = 'v1';

  /* Do not edit below this line */
  (function() {
    window.ssp = window.ssp || function() {
      (window.ssp.q = window.ssp.q || []).push(arguments)
    };
    var a = document.createElement("script");
    a.type = "text/javascript", a.async = !0,
    a.src = "https://" + window.ssp_key + "." + window.ssp_tld + "/" + window.ssp_version + "/ssp.js?env=" + window.ssp_env + "&lang=" + window.ssp_lang;
    var b = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
    b.parentNode.insertBefore(a, b), window.ssp.SNIPPET_VERSION = "1.3.1"
  })();
</script>

/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'DN1XA328MBES1KA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'DN1NK239LSLX7FE',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'a4ae296e-28b1-45cb-92fa-d8320aad8bbc';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'DN1MA195LSLX7FE',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'a4ae296e-28b1-45cb-92fa-d8320aad8bbc';

		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();

(function(){
try {

	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();

	    id: 'DN1XI339MBPS7CR',
	    sku: ''
	}];

	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';

	    });

(function(){
try {

	var cq_params = {};

	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();

	    sku: ''

	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';

	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);

	    });

/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CF1XA015CB24EAB',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";

	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();

</script>

		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '83145970-e930-4bc1-9fcb-f57e5ba08245';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CBPS157157C',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';

	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";

	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });

} catch(err) {}

	    });

} catch(err) {}

	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN0ON197LQBLGFE',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN0XH307KCXI0DP',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '83145970-e930-4bc1-9fcb-f57e5ba08245';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN0XH307KCXI1CA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '83145970-e930-4bc1-9fcb-f57e5ba08245';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CBPS156156B',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CBPS159159A',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '83145970-e930-4bc1-9fcb-f57e5ba08245';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CBPS159159B',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '83145970-e930-4bc1-9fcb-f57e5ba08245';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN0WJ139LSLX0PA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'f9e4fe6b-2489-4399-a41e-b210dc4b63b8';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN0XR312MBSE0PA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();

// -->
</script>

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN0XK301MBSSA32',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'f9e4fe6b-2489-4399-a41e-b210dc4b63b8';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN0WJ000LRMCI24',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();

// -->
</script>

(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;

	    id: 'CF1XA070MB38GEM',
	    sku: ''
	}];

	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';

	    });

try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};

/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CF0XF090SD86GQX',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';

	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";

	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();

		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();

	    id: 'CBPS150150F',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CBPS160160A',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS104104F',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'f9e4fe6b-2489-4399-a41e-b210dc4b63b8';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN1XK286MLTN1KA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--

try {

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN1XK287MLTN1KA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else

	    });
  }

</script>

	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS140140A',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN1MA195LSLX437',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CF1XF090SD50EJS',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '6b6c5e15-1a79-4832-b54b-7784e29daaf1';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CF1XG050KF98GAB',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '6b6c5e15-1a79-4832-b54b-7784e29daaf1';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'BBPS151151C',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '6b6c5e15-1a79-4832-b54b-7784e29daaf1';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

/* <![CDATA[ (viewProduct-active_data.js) */

/* ]]> */

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CF1XC015KF980PA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'f753cf11-7749-4626-a112-1f5ad31f8d29';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();

// -->

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'BN1RQ202LNPA3KB',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN1NK196LAVE0PA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'f753cf11-7749-4626-a112-1f5ad31f8d29';

		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}

	    });

} catch(err) {}

	    id: 'BN1ON197LKXB3UA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

	    id: 'YBPS127127A',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';

	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'BF1XF065SC84GFE',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();

</script>

/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN1WJ084LVTL0PA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';

	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';

	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";

	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);

	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}

try {

		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';

		search_params.showProducts = 'true';

		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}

/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN1WH004LVTL0PA',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';

		search_params.showProducts = 'true';

} catch(err) {}

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'XN4WJ002LVTL3BZ',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */

		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'a9eb15e3-c9da-4c93-b6a1-4a2316fd92ea';

		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';

			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();

} catch(err) {}

} catch(err) {}

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS140140C',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS131131A',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

(function(){

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS138138B',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'a9eb15e3-c9da-4c93-b6a1-4a2316fd92ea';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();

	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'AF1XA050MB35GFE',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'a9eb15e3-c9da-4c93-b6a1-4a2316fd92ea';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();

	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'AF1XF035VC45GFE',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = 'a9eb15e3-c9da-4c93-b6a1-4a2316fd92ea';

		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPSX102102L',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '78b2fe84-2a23-441a-9cc6-6cb0d3c8b2f6';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewProduct-active_data.js) */
dw.ac._capture({id: "ABPSX102102L", type: "searchhit"});
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS128128F',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '78b2fe84-2a23-441a-9cc6-6cb0d3c8b2f6';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->

	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS139139C',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '78b2fe84-2a23-441a-9cc6-6cb0d3c8b2f6';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}

        <!-- CQuotient Activity Tracking (viewCategory-cquotient.js) -->
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS146L146D',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'category position';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '78b2fe84-2a23-441a-9cc6-6cb0d3c8b2f6';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'default';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-accessories", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'YBPS128128A',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'ABPS145145E',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function(){
try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'CN1XK135MLTOICH',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-accessories';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-accessories\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'category position';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BHGX";
	cq_params.siteId = "balmain-us";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "default";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

try {
